p: E-commerce refers to the buying and selling of goods or services online. This can be done through a dedicated e-commerce website, online marketplaces like Amazon or eBay, or social media platforms like Instagram...

Business financing refers to the process of securing involves funding for a business. This can included crowd funding, traditional bank loans, venture capital, angel investors, and crowd funding, or other forms of financing...

Product marketing promoting and selling a specific product to potential customers. This includes identifying the target audience, creating messaging and branding, developing marketing campaigns, measuring of these...

A business idea is a concept or plan improving an existing business for a potential business venture. This can include identifying a gap in the market, developing a new product or service, or improving an existing business model...

A custom portfolio is a collection of investments that is tailored to the specific needs and goals of an individual or organization. This can include a mix of stocks, bonds, mutual funds, and other investments...

Brand promotion involves increasing awareness and visibility of a brand. This can include that the advertising campaigns, social media marketing, influencer partnerships, and other tactics to build  brand recognition...
